title: New champ select doesn't pop up when its my turn to pick/ban, so i lost my promos.
body: Seriously, i don't even care that i lost my promos, i'm not begging for them back, it'll take me 1 game to get back then another 2 easy wins. BUT FOR REAL, i want to do other things while people do their dumb bans. I have lost 20 lp total now just from it not popping up and me being habit tabbed out in champ select. Please, hotfix this and make the champ select actually pop up when it is your turn to do anything.

replies.body:
Don't you know? That's  just another feature of the new champ select! Just like locking in bans/picks. These features are designed to force you to sit in champ select like god (Riot Lyte) intended.

But seriously though that sucks. It's hard to believe they put 6 months of work into new champ select and yet there are so many features left out.
